meanings.definition: The quality or state of being slimy.
meanings.sent1: The sliminesses of the mud made it difficult to walk through.
meanings.sent2: I could feel the sliminesses of the fish as I held it in my hands.
meanings.sent3: The sliminesses of the slime monster made it hard to catch him in the game.
meanings.sent4: The sliminesses of the situation left a trail of suspicion in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The sliminesses of the frog's skin felt like wet rubber to the touch.

meanings.definition: The feeling or appearance of being slimy.
meanings.sent1: She shuddered at the sliminesses of the raw egg white on her fingers.
meanings.sent2: The sliminesses of the algae on the rock made it slippery to climb.
meanings.sent3: The sliminesses of the slime toy made it a hit with the kids at the party.
meanings.sent4: The sliminesses of the politician's promises made the voters wary.
meanings.sent5: The sliminesses of the snail's trail glistened in the sunlight.
